subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Bill Belichick’s funereal demeanor is rooted in the public imagination, but as one N.F.L. network analyst said, meetings with him can be illuminating, even fun.
snippet: Bill Belichick’s funereal demeanor is rooted in the public imagination, but as one N.F.L. network analyst said, meetings with him can be illuminating, even fun.
